home.title: Dofollo | AI-Powered Internal Linking Tool for SEO
home.description: Boost your SEO with Dofollo's AI-powered internal linking tool. Automate link building, improve site structure, and rank higher on Google.

home.ogTitle: Dofollo - AI-Powered Internal Linking for Better Rankings
home.ogDescription: Automate your internal linking strategy with Dofollo. Improve crawlability and boost your SEO rankings effortlessly.
home.twitterDescription: Boost your SEO with AI-powered internal linking. Try Dofollo today.

features.title: Features | Powerful SEO & Internal Linking Features - Dofollo
features.description: Explore Dofollo's powerful features: AI link suggestions, competitor analysis, broken link checker, and automated internal linking to supercharge your SEO.
features.keywords: seo features, internal linking automation, competitor analysis seo, broken link checker, link management
features.ogDescription: Discover how Dofollo's AI features can transform your website's internal linking structure and SEO performance.
features.twitterDescription: From AI suggestions to competitor analysis, see what Dofollo can do for your SEO.

tools.title: Free SEO Tools | Optimize Your Website with Dofollo
tools.description: Access a suite of free SEO tools including Link Counter, Keyword Density Checker, and more to analyze and improve your website's performance.
tools.keywords: free seo tools, link counter, keyword density checker, seo analysis, webmaster tools
tools.ogDescription: Use our collection of free SEO tools to analyze and optimize your website's content and structure.
tools.twitterDescription: Free SEO tools to help you rank higher. Check out our Link Counter and Keyword Density Checker.

support.title: Support | Dofollo Help Center & Contact

support.twitterDescription: Need assistance? Contact the Dofollo support team.

link-counter.title: Free Link Counter Tool | Count Website Links Instantly
link-counter.description: Count all internal and external links on your website with our free Link Counter tool. Analyze your website's link structure instantly. No registration required.
link-counter.keywords: link counter, count links, internal links, external links, link analysis tool, website link checker, free link counter

link-counter.ogDescription: Free online link counter tool to count all internal and external links on your website instantly.
link-counter.twitterDescription: Count all links on your website instantly with our free Link Counter tool.

keyword-density.title: Free Keyword Density Checker | SEO Content Analysis Tool
keyword-density.description: Check the keyword density of your content with our free Keyword Density Checker. Avoid keyword stuffing and optimize your on-page SEO effectively.
keyword-density.keywords: keyword density checker, keyword usage, seo content analysis, keyword stuffing checker, on-page seo tool
keyword-density.ogTitle: Keyword Density Checker - Free SEO Tool
keyword-density.ogDescription: Analyze your content for optimal keyword usage with our free Keyword Density Checker. Improve your rankings today.
keyword-density.twitterDescription: Prevent keyword stuffing and optimize your content with our free analysis tool.
